tab1.text1:
<TextStyle.Orange>New: Twisted Whiskers — Valguero</>

<TextStyle.White>Welcome survivor. Valguero has arrived: rugged mountains, dense forests, treacherous caves, and an underground ocean that hides both peril and reward. Team up with friends or carve your own legend.</>

<TextStyle.Green>How to navigate this UI:</>
- Use the tabs above for rules, rates, events and shops.
- Check back often; community polls and updates can change rates and rules.

<TextStyle.Violet>Essential Links</>
Discord: dsc.gg/twistedwhiskers
Webshop / Starters: www.twistedkittensgaming.com

<TextStyle.Green>Starter Kits</>
Starter kits are available via the webshop. Note: if you received an in-game starter on admission, the website starter will not be available to you. See Shop tab for details.

<TextStyle.White>How to open this screen:</>
PC: Press F1
PS5: Hold Square → highlight the wolf icon → press R2
tab1.text3:
<TextStyle.Violet>Server Notices</>
- Daily restart: 03:00 EST
- Connect your Discord and game account to claim a token connection bonus:
  https://twistedkittensgaming.premiumark.net/news/67145-Tkg-Webshop

<TextStyle.Violet>Common Chat Commands</>
!help — Command list
!balance — Show webshop token balance
!report — Submit admin report
!review — Leave feedback
!dinowipe — Dino wipe schedule
!rules — Display rules
!flag — Flag compliance kit
!die — Kill your survivor
!reset — Teleport to safe location (does not teleport tames)
!discord — Discord invite
!website — Official website
!shop — Admin shop

tab2.text1:
<TextStyle.White>These community rules are enforced to keep gameplay balanced and enjoyable. Suggestions are welcomed via Discord and may be added by community vote.</>

<TextStyle.Violet>Base & Building</>
- One base per tribe per map; solo players may have one base per map.
- If a solo player joins a tribe, any solo base must be removed or merged with tribe locations.
- Do not place builds that block high-resource areas, explorer notes, or artifacts.
- Excessive builds or lag-inducing structures may be restricted; request a Base Limit Device from an admin if needed.

<TextStyle.Violet>Player Conduct</>
- No harassment, griefing, egg theft, or structure spamming.
- Clean up traps after use.
- Admins do not replace tames/items lost through gameplay; in the rare event of server-side loss, community-wide token compensation may be issued.

<TextStyle.Red>Enforcement</>
1) First offense: verbal warning + 24-hour correction window posted in Discord.
2) Second offense: removal/wipe of offending structure/dino/player.
3) Third offense within 30 days: permanent ban.

Admin requests are processed in order — please be patient; staff are volunteers. See Discord for open staff/volunteer roles.
tab2.text2:
<RichColor Color="1,0,0,1">SERVER SETTINGS</>

<TextStyle.Green>Experience & Combat</>
XP: 1.5x | Alpha Kill XP: 1.33x | Boss XP: 2.5x | Wild Kill XP: 1.25x | Crafting XP: 1.25x

<TextStyle.Green>Taming & Resources</>
Taming Speed: 5x
Harvest Amount: 2.5x

<TextStyle.Green>Survivor Settings</>
Water Drain: 0.75x | Food Drain: 0.75x | Health Recovery: 2.5x
Player Resistance: 1.25x | Player Damage: 1.25x

<TextStyle.Green>World Mechanics</>
Decay Timer: 3.5x | Structure Resistance: 0x
Time: 24 in-game hours = 120 real minutes
Map location visibility: Enabled
tab2.text3:
For the latest mods, patch notes and change logs, visit the website or join Discord:
www.twistedkittensgaming.com
Discord: dsc.gg/twistedwhiskers

tab3.text1:
<TextStyle.Orange>Monthly Events</>
- Word of the Month: Guess the monthly secret word in global chat to receive free tokens. Winners are announced in-game and in Discord.
- Starter Lotto: Webshop lottery with prizes up to 1000 tokens. New tiers will be added over time.

<TextStyle.Violet>Performance & Stability</>
If you need better performance on console or low-end PC, follow our optimization guide:
https://twistedkittensgaming.premiumark.net/news/92130-commands-to-help-console-and-lower-speedperformance-pcs

<TextStyle.Green>Quick Commands (Reminder)</>
!help | !balance | !report | !review | !dinowipe | !rules | !flag | !die | !reset | !discord | !website | !shop
tab3.text3:
<TextStyle.Red>Bob Beach Treasure Hunt</>
Five treasure caches spawn on each map monthly. Prizes include tames, building materials, token consumables, and more. Search beaches and claim rewards.
tab3.text4:
<TextStyle.White>Community Quests</>
Active quests and future events are listed in Discord. Submit quest ideas in #event-suggestions to be considered for upcoming rotations.

tab4.text1:
<TextStyle.White>Registered player shops follow a code of conduct to protect buyers and maintain quality. Shopping from verified sellers reduces risk and improves trade reliability.</>

<TextStyle.Orange>Marketplace Rules</>
- All tame sales must include a saddle.
- Spayed/neutered tames may not be sold by registered shops.
- Stackable goods should be sold in full stacks where applicable.
- Token transactions are admin-enforceable; reported issues will be investigated.

<TextStyle.Violet>Featured Vendor</>
Shop Name: Dragonstone Egg Emporium
Discord: MalachThor
Owner: Dragon Lord
Map: The Island
Location: 65.6, 31.2 (TP: Dragonstone)
Goods: Tames and Eggs
tab4.text2:
<TextStyle.Green>How to Report a Shop Issue</>
Report via in-game !report, Discord, or at www.twistedkittensgaming.com. Include:
- Date and time of transaction
- Description of the issue (e.g., missing saddle)
- Shop name and location
- Seller survivor name

Admins will review and, if necessary, issue refunds or penalties.
tab4.text3:
Full list of shops and admin listings available on the website:
www.twistedkittensgaming.com
